articles.description: Tottenham manager Thomas Frank remains in deep trouble despite his side rescuing a late draw at Burnley, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Burnley 2-2 Tottenham: Thomas Frank remains on brink at Spurs

articles.description: Liverpool's struggles can no longer be hidden by their long unbeaten run after their last-gasp defeat at Bournemouth, writes Aadam Patel.
articles.title: Bournemouth 3-2 Liverpool: Arne Slot's side lose long unbeaten run

articles.description: England captain Harry Brook says the pitch used for the second one-day international against Sri Lanka in Colombo was "probably the worst" he's played on.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Harry Brook calls Colombo pitch for second ODI 'probably the worst' he's played on

articles.description: Head coach Eddie Howe believes Newcastle United can still achieve "great things" despite financial restrictions as his side look to upset the league's status quo.
articles.title: Newcastle vs Aston Villa: Eddie Howe out to 'upset the status quo'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Villarreal vs Real Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Villarreal vs Real Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Amine Adli scores a stoppage-time winner as Bournemouth end Liverpool's 13–game unbeaten run in a thrilling match at Vitality Stadium.e
articles.title: AFC Bournemouth 3-2 Liverpool: Bournemouth grab win in added time in thriller against Liverpool

articles.description: North American teenagers Iva Jovic and Victoria Mboko are through to the fourth round of the Australian Open for the first time.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Iva Jovic & Victoria Mboko - doubles partners leading teen disruptors

articles.description: Joe Root makes a measured 75 as England pull off a comfortable run chase to beat Sri Lanka by five wickets in the second one-day international which squared the three-match series.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs England: Joe Root helps tourists level ODI series

articles.description: Referee Farai Hallam was praised for choosing not to award Manchester City a penalty against Wolves on his Premier League debut.
articles.title: Farai Hallam makes 'brave' call to deny Man City penalty against Wolves

articles.description: Back-to-back Premier League wins have taken West Ham United to within two points of 17th.
articles.title: West Ham United 'clear the rot' and have rivals 'looking over their shoulders'
